meanings.definition: Fine outgrowths or appendages on plants, typically glandular and hair-like in structure.
meanings.sent1: The trichomes on the leaves of the plant help protect it from insects.
meanings.sent2: The gardener observed the trichomes on the stem of the flower.
meanings.sent3: The trichomes on the cactus seemed like tiny guardians standing tall.
meanings.sent4: The trichomes danced in the breeze, like delicate strands of silk.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the trichomes appeared like a forest of tiny trees.
